column5: WE are going to try our luck on the big pond SUNDAY JUNE 10 2012  Anyone going out .  ITs going to be a hot one so they will be down deep. But we are going to give it a shot anyways. light winds and half meter wave they say. SO thats good for my boat. WE are going out of PORT CREDIT around 6.30 am WE are rigged and ready for a great day on the water.
Pike tomorrow and some residents in the evening.
Local gem of a small lake that I will be fishing for pike all day.
good luck - we're heading out of our usual spot  in the afternoon - the am is booked.
Yup, we'll see if the fishing is as hot as the weather
Contemplating going out for some Pike action at my favourite local lake...  Its friggen hot already...no shade on my boat either...hmmm
